@webdoc/example > PIXI > ObjectRenderer

PIXI.ObjectRenderer 

class ObjectRenderer extends PIXI.System implements

Base for a common object renderer that can be used as a system renderer plugin.

Constructor

new PIXI.ObjectRenderer(renderer: PIXI.Renderer) → {}
Parameters:
Name Type Description
renderer PIXI.Renderer

The renderer this manager works for.

Summary

Properties inherited from System

PIXI.Renderer
renderer

The renderer this manager works for.

Public Methods

destroy StreamBuilder.js:736 
destroy() → {}

Generic destruction method that frees all resources. This should be called by subclasses.

flush StreamBuilder.js:729 
flush() → {}

Stub method that should be used to empty the current batch by rendering objects now.

render StreamBuilder.js:759 
render(object: PIXI.DisplayObject) → {}

Keeps the object to render. It doesn't have to be rendered immediately.

Parameters:
Name Type Description
object PIXI.DisplayObject

The object to render.
start StreamBuilder.js:743 
start() → {}

Stub method that initializes any state required before rendering starts. It is different from the prerender signal, which occurs every frame, in that it is called whenever an object requests this renderer specifically.

stop StreamBuilder.js:752 
stop() → {}

Stops the renderer. It should free up any state and become dormant.
